subject: Another weird device
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
You know me and my weird devices... yes I've built another.
This one came to me in a dream last night.  I think it was because some 
of you guys were talking about echo chambers.
Anyway... when I woke up I went looking around the house for stuff to 
make this thing before I forgot what it looked like in my dream.
I completed it but now I guess I must test it to see if it is what I 
think it is... an EVP Box, maybe???

Read more and see a few pictures, here: http://www.ufogeek.com/?p=200

- Mike
